title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Industrial Production and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Industrial Production and 

Turnover) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (industrial production turnover) order 2024

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to
heading: 2. (1) In this Order —
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order — 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 November 20191 as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20063, as 
amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20125, and Regulation (EU) 
2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 20196; 

“relevant period” means the period beginning on 1 March 2024 and ending on 
28 February 2029; 

“survey” means the Industrial Production and Turnover Survey that is 
conducted by the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining 
information set out in the Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance 
with the Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as it has in the Regulation, 
other than where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order -- regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 20212 regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 mean regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20063 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20084 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20125 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20196 relevant period mean period beginning 1 march 2024 ending 28 february 2029 survey mean industrial production turnover survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information set schedule including purpose compliance regulation (2) word expression used order also regulation meaning order regulation context otherwise requires

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to
heading: 4. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
4. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes in division 36 or group 35.3 of section D or group 38.3 of section E of 
NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 to provide, 
for the purposes of the survey, the information specified in subparagraphs (a), 
(d), (e), (f) and (g) of paragraph 1 and paragraph 2 of the Schedule, is hereby 
prescribed.
text_norm: 4 requirement undertaking classified statistical purpose division 36 group 35.3 section group 38.3 section e nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 provide purpose survey information specified subparagraphs (a) (d) (e) (f) (g) paragraph 1 paragraph 2 schedule hereby prescribed

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to
heading: 5. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
5. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under section D or section E of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to 
Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 to provide, for the purposes of the survey, the 
information specified in subparagraphs (b), (d), (e), (f) and (g) of paragraph 1 
and paragraph 2 of the Schedule, is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 5 requirement undertaking classified statistical purpose section section e nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 provide purpose survey information specified subparagraphs (b) (d) (e) (f) (g) paragraph 1 paragraph 2 schedule hereby prescribed

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to
heading: 6. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
6. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes in group 38.3 of section E of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to 
Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 to provide, for the purposes of the survey, the 
information specified in subparagraphs (c), (d), (e), (f) and (g) of paragraph 1 
and paragraph 2 of the Schedule, is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 6 requirement undertaking classified statistical purpose group 38.3 section e nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 provide purpose survey information specified subparagraphs (c) (d) (e) (f) (g) paragraph 1 paragraph 2 schedule hereby prescribed

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to
heading: 7. (1) This Article applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
7. (1) This Article applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under section B, C, D or E of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to 
Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006. 

(2) Subject to paragraph (3), a requirement on an undertaking to which this 
Article applies to provide for the purposes of the survey the information set out 
in the Schedule, is hereby prescribed. 

(3) Where an undertaking to which this Article applies is subject to a 
requirement under Article 3, 4, 5 or 6 to provide the information referred to in 
the Article concerned, the requirement referred to in paragraph (2) shall not 
extend to the provision by that undertaking of that information.
text_norm: 7 (1) article applies undertaking classified statistical purpose section b c e nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 (2) subject paragraph (3) requirement undertaking article applies provide purpose survey information set schedule hereby prescribed (3) undertaking article applies subject requirement article 3 4 5 6 provide information referred article concerned requirement referred paragraph (2) shall extend provision undertaking information

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to
heading: 8. The undertakings in relation to whom a requirement to provide
text_raw:
8. The undertakings in relation to whom a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in Articles 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7 shall provide the 
information referred to in the Article concerned monthly in the relevant period 
in relation to the immediately preceding month.
text_norm: 8 undertaking relation requirement provide information prescribed article 3 4 5 6 7 shall provide information referred article concerned monthly relevant period relation immediately preceding month

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and, in relation to

text_raw:
9. The Statistics (Industrial Production and Turnover) Order 2019 (S.I. 

No. 261 of 2019) is revoked.
